sectionDeptRestriction: Restricted to students in the Music department.
sectionNotes: Restricted to students with Junior or Senior class standing.
sectionText: Topic:  Music Signal Processing for Composers and Music Technology majors. Learn use of two software packages: SNDAN, for analyzing,viewing, modifying, and resynthesizing sounds; and Music 4C, for synthesizing sounds from numerical and text scores. Students will also learn the rudiments of the Unix operating system and C programming to generate scores and to design custom computer instruments.
